checkIn.title: Weekly Crop Check-In
checkIn.subtitle: Complete this checklist to assess your crop health

questions.pest-1: Have you noticed any unusual insect activity on leaves or stems?
questions.pest-2: Are there visible holes or damage on plant leaves?
questions.pest-3: Have you seen any caterpillars or larvae on the crop?
questions.disease-1: Are there any yellow or brown spots on the leaves?
questions.disease-2: Do you see any wilting or drooping of plants despite adequate water?
questions.disease-3: Is there any white powdery substance or mold on leaves?
questions.disease-4: Are there any rotting symptoms on stems or roots?
questions.water-1: Is the soil too dry or cracked?
questions.water-2: Is there waterlogging or standing water in the field?
questions.water-3: Are irrigation channels or systems working properly?
questions.nutrient-1: Are the leaves yellowing from the bottom up?
questions.nutrient-2: Is plant growth slower than expected for this stage?
questions.nutrient-3: Are leaves smaller or paler than normal?
questions.growth-1: Is the crop developing at the expected rate?
questions.growth-2: Are there any plants that are significantly stunted?
questions.weather-1: Has there been extreme heat (>35°C) in the past week?
questions.weather-2: Has there been heavy rainfall causing damage?
questions.weather-3: Has there been unexpected frost or cold?
